heading: Nightmare Dungeon Tier List Updates for Patch 1.1.1
content: Nightmare Dungeon Tier List Updates have been implemented. increased Monster Density and Boss Health in Nightmare Dungeons, so we went in and collected the data again! Through testing and community feedback it appears as if the Boss Health buff hasn't actually been implemented into the game yet, but the increase in density has merited some notable changes to the If you haven't already, head on over to our and select the D4 role in #Roles to stay up to date with our content development.
